message: I'd like to buy the product, but I'd appreciate it if you could provide some information about the product's quality before I make a final decision.
I'd like to pass on this product based on your recommendation, but I'd like to ask, how many products have been offered so far, and what's the proportion of high-quality products sold out of those?
I'd like to buy the product, even though you don't recommend it. I want to see if I can beat the odds and get a high-quality product.
I'm willing to take the risk despite your recommendation, but I'd like to know the probability of the product being high-quality based on the previous sales record.
I'd like to buy the product, but I'm not taking your recommendation into account. I'll make my decision based on my own probability calculations.
I'd like to know why you're not recommending the product. Is there a reason you think it's low quality?
I'd like to buy the product, but only if Alice is recommending it. Otherwise, I'm not interested.
